description: The newly-formed team will play Guernsey FC on 15 August thanks to an air bridge between the islands.
title: FC Isle of Man to play Guernsey FC in first ever match
title_page: FC Isle of Man to play Guernsey FC in first ever match - BBC News
maintext: Several rules had to be amended to allow the team to become affiliated with the Isle of Man FA before an application to join the English league could be made.
